headerDisplay: This is a plugin for [homebridge](https://github.com/nfarina/homebridge). It monitors who is at home, based on their smartphone being seen on the network recently. It can also receive webhooks sent by location-aware mobile apps (such as [Locative](https://my.locative.io), which can use iBeacons and geofencing to provide faster and more accurate location information.
footerDisplay: Visit the [Pair](https://github.com/PeteLawrence/homebridge-people#pairing-with-a-location-aware-mobile-app) section of the [Project Page](https://github.com/PeteLawrence/homebridge-people), if you need help with pairing with a location-aware mobile app.
